ECT ENTRY  
IMSU and FUNAAB accept ND/HND for Direct Entry to 
200/300 levels respectively.   
IBADAN and IMSU -as in Agriculture.  
FUTO and UNN - as in Agricultural Economics  
FUNAAB accepts  
Two (2) ' A’ level credit passes in Chemistry and one of 
Zoology/Botany/Agricultural  Science/Biology, 
Mathematics or Physics.  
ND/HND upper credit in Agriculture from a recognised 
institution in any one (1) of Agricultural Economics, 
Agricultural Extension, Fisheries, Forestry and Wildlife 
Management, Agricultural Technology plus the UTME 
requirements.  
NCE credit in Agricultural Science, Biology, Chemistry or 
Physics plus the UTME requirements.  
OAU accepts   
Two (2) `A' level passes in Chemistry and one (1) of 
Zoology/ Botany/ Agricultural Science/ Biology, 
Mathematics, Physics, or Economics.  
HND/ND in Agriculture obtained at upper credit level 
from a recognized Institution  
LAUTECH accepts ND with upper cred it/HND/NCE at 
credit Level in relevant subjects plus the UTME 
requirements

    a.  credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, 
Chemistry, Physics and Biology.  
    b.  at least ‘O’ level pass in Physics.  
    c.  candidates with ‘O’ level pass in Biology must possess 
‘O’ level credit pass in Agricultural Science. Does not 
accept Agricultural Science in lieu of Biology.
